title: User Registration with Valid Phone Number and Correct OTP
description: Verify user can register successfully using a valid phone number and correct OTP, then set password and provide personal info including avatar.

steps.description: Open the app and navigate through introduction cards.
Tap on registration and enter a valid phone number.
Receive OTP and enter the correct code.
Confirm OTP validation is successful and proceed.
Set a valid password.
Enter personal details including uploading an avatar.
Verify registration completes and user is redirected to login or app home.

title: User Registration with Invalid Phone Number
description: Verify registration prevents proceeding when an invalid phone number is entered.

steps.description: Launch app and navigate to registration screen.
Enter an invalid phone number format.
Verify app shows validation error message about invalid phone number.

title: OTP Verification with Incorrect Code
description: Verify that entering incorrect OTP code prevents registration and shows appropriate error message.

steps.description: Begin registration with a valid phone number.
Input an incorrect OTP code.
Verify registration flow does not proceed and shows OTP error.

title: Login with Correct Phone Number and Password
description: Verify user can login successfully with correct phone number and password.

steps.description: Open login screen.
Enter valid registered phone number and correct password.
Tap login button.
User is logged in and redirected to the main app interface.

title: Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify error message displays correctly when user attempts login with incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid phone number but wrong password.
Tap login.
Verify login is denied with clear error message.

title: Prevent Multi-Device Login
description: Verify that login is blocked if the user tries to login from a second device simultaneously.

steps.description: Login successfully on Device 1 with valid credentials.
Attempt to login on Device 2 using same credentials.
Verify that login on Device 2 is blocked with an appropriate message.

title: Browse Course Catalog and View Course Details
description: Verify user can browse the course catalog and view detailed information including demo video, instructor info, pricing, and course contents.

steps.description: Login as a student.
Navigate to course catalog.
Select a course specialization and drill down to subject and course.
Confirm course details page displays demo video, instructor, price, multimedia lessons, and purchase options.

title: Purchase Course via External Messenger with Pre-filled Message
description: Verify purchase course link opens WhatsApp or Telegram with the correct pre-filled message for payment.

steps.description: On course purchase page, tap purchase link/button.
Verify external messenger (WhatsApp or Telegram) opens with pre-filled purchase message.

title: Activate Course Code and Access Course Content
description: Verify user can enter a valid purchased course code, activate it successfully, and gain access to course materials and lessons.

steps.description: Navigate to course code activation page.
Enter a valid course access code.
Submit activation request.
Confirm activation success message and that course contents become accessible.

title: Video Playback with DRM Protection and Controls
description: Verify DRM protected course videos play correctly with available controls and prevent unauthorized screen recording.

steps.description: Open a course lesson with video.
Play the DRM protected video.
Verify video playback controls work as expected (play, pause, seek).
Verify screen recording is blocked or disabled during playback.

title: Complete End-of-Unit Quiz and Upload Media Answer
description: Verify user can complete quizzes at the end of course units and upload media files within allowed duration as part of answers.

steps.description: Navigate to a quiz after completing a video lesson.
Answer quiz questions.
Upload a media file not exceeding 30 seconds as required.
Verify quiz submission is accepted and feedback given.

title: Apply Valid Coupon Code with Eligibility
description: Verify that applying a valid coupon code grants discount only if eligibility criteria such as minimum purchased courses are met.

steps.description: Go to the course purchase screen.
Enter a valid coupon code that requires a minimum number of purchased courses.
Verify discount is applied and price is updated accordingly.

title: Reject Coupon Code When Eligibility Not Met
description: Verify that a coupon code does not apply discount if eligibility criteria are not met and displays appropriate feedback.

steps.description: Attempt to apply coupon code without meeting minimum course purchase conditions.
Verify coupon is rejected with an explanatory message.

title: Edit User Profile Information and Change Password
description: Verify that users can edit their profile personal information and successfully change their password.

steps.description: Login and navigate to profile settings.
Edit personal information such as name and avatar.
Submit changes and verify update success.
Navigate to password change screen.
Enter old password and set new password.
Verify password is changed and user can login with new password.

title: Submit User Suggestion and Verify Admin Receives It
description: Verify user can submit suggestions or feedback through the app and that admin dashboard receives and displays them.

steps.description: Login as user and submit a suggestion or feedback.
Confirm submission success message.
Login as admin and navigate to suggestions management.
Verify newly submitted suggestion appears in admin dashboard.

title: Admin Login and Access Various Management Modules
description: Verify admin can log in via web dashboard and access modules for course, student, sales, financial, coupon, ads, suggestions, and sub-admin management.

steps.description: Admin logs into dashboard with valid credentials.
Verify dashboard and sidebar load correctly.
Navigate sequentially to: Course Management, Student Management, Sales Management, Financial Management, Coupon Management, Ads Management, Suggestions Management, Sub-Admin Management.
Verify each module loads and displays relevant data and controls.

title: Admin Creates and Exports Financial Reports in Excel Format
description: Verify admin can create financial reports, export them in Excel format complying with standards, and that exported data is accurate.

steps.description: Admin navigates to Financial Management module.
Generate a sales/financial report for a date range.
Export report to Excel.
Verify the exported Excel file downloads correctly and its content matches the generated report data.

title: Admin Verifies YouTube Video Links and Flags Broken URLs
description: Verify that the system checks the validity of YouTube video links, flags broken or invalid URLs, and disables or alerts admin accordingly.

steps.description: Admin navigates to Link Verification module.
Trigger video link verification scan.
Verify broken or invalid YouTube links are flagged, disabled, and admin receives notifications.

title: Admin Manages User Suggestions - Mark as Read and Delete
description: Verify admin can mark user suggestions as read, delete them, and changes reflect dynamically.

steps.description: Admin opens Suggestions Management module.
Select a suggestion and mark as read.
Verify suggestion status updates to read immediately.
Delete a selected suggestion.
Verify suggestion is removed from list without page reload.

title: Validation of User Input Fields Across Registration and Purchase
description: Verify all user input fields including registration inputs, course codes, and coupon codes have strict validation and provide visual feedback on errors.

steps.description: Attempt to submit registration with missing or invalid data fields.
Verify relevant validation messages appear next to inputs.
Enter invalid course or coupon codes and submit.
Verify invalid code errors are displayed with clear messages.

title: User Notification Center Displays Alerts
description: Verify notification center shows alerts for new courses, course updates, and expiring codes accurately and users can dismiss notifications.

steps.description: Login as user and navigate to notification center.
Verify alerts for new courses, updates, and expiring codes are displayed.
Dismiss one or more notifications.
Verify dismissed notifications are removed from view.

title: User and Admin UI Usability and Responsiveness
description: Verify all user and admin interfaces meet usability guidelines including clarity of layout, ease of navigation, and responsiveness on target devices.

steps.description: Open user and admin screens on Android and iOS devices of various sizes.
Verify UI components are clear, easy to navigate, and adapt correctly to different screen sizes.
Verify buttons and controls are accessible without overlap or truncation.
